com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.endpoints

Class AbstractCommentOperationService<T extends OperationExtension,U extends Operation,S extends Comment>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.cq.social.scf.core.operations.AbstractOperationService<T,U,S>
      • com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.endpoints.AbstractCommentOperationService<T,U,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - is a OperationExtension that will be used as hooks by the extending class.
    U - is a Operation that is being provided by the extending class.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationService<T,U,S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractForumOperationsService

    @Property(name="fieldWhitelist",value={"cq:tags","tags","composedFor"},cardinality=100) @Property(name="attachmentTypeBlacklist",cardinality=2147483647,value="DEFAULT")
public abstract class AbstractCommentOperationService<T extends OperationExtension,U extends Operation,S extends Comment>
extends AbstractOperationService<T,U,S>
    Provides abstract implementation of comment operations. This class can be extended to implement create/delete/update operations for any component that extends the comment system.

      • delete

        public void delete(Resource commentResource,
                   com.adobe.cq.social.commons.CommentSystem cs,
                   Session session,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> conditionals)
            throws OperationException
        Process a comment delete request sent by a client. Sends back a 204 if the delete succeeded with no entity.
        Parameters:
        commentResource - the comment to delete
        cs - the comment system
        session - the session used to delete
        conditionals - Map
        Throws:
        OperationException - when the session cannot save the changes in the comment system
